availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lewis Alexander Courtney (Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Hickman County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Hannah Wooley Courtney in Nelson County, Kentucky, on September 22, 1830. Father of John T. Courtney, S. Elizabeth Courtney, Savilla A. Courtney, M.L. Courtney, Julia A. Courtney, and and Marcus C. Courtney. Farmer in Hickman County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Hickman County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, p. 38A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Hays, p. 535-536.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Nelson County Marriages, Film 000009665.
